info.title: Event Scheduling and Resevation
info.description:
This is the documentation for EventX an online event organizing and reservation system. the API is hosted on Heroku, and can be found at https://event-reservation-system.herokuapp.com 

if you want to test the endpoints then the variable {{url}} should be https://event-reservation-system.herokuapp.com without trailing slash or your server IP Address if you clone the Laravel app to your local machine.

All .env parameters needed are available at the .env.example file, kindly use the variable and replace with your own parameters

value.message: The event name has already been taken.

event_name: The event name has already been taken.

value.message: The selected user id is invalid.

user_id: The selected user id is invalid.

example.message: The selected event id is invalid.

event_id: The selected event id is invalid.

value.message: The maximum reservation you supplied is higher than the seats left
You already create a regular ticket for this event

example-0.summary: Register error, password condition not satisfied

value.message: The password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.

password: The password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.

value.message: The email has already been taken.

email: The email has already been taken.

example.message: Credentials do not match our records
